member.name: T:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog
member.summary: Represents a common dialog box (Win32::SHBrowseForFolder()) that allows a user to select a folder.

member.name: M:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Constructs a BrowseForFolderDialog with default BrowseInfoFlags set to BIF_NEWDIALOGSTYLE.

member.name: M:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.SendMessageW(System.IntPtr,System.UInt32,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr)
member.returns: The result of the message processing

member.name: M:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.ShowDialog(System.Windows.Window)
member.summary: Shows the dialog (Win32::SHBrowseForFolder()) with its hwndOwner set to the handle of 'owner'.

member.name: M:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.SHBrowseForFolderW(Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BROWSEINFOW)
member.summary: The sh browse for folder w.
member.returns: A pointer that specifies the location of the selected folder relative to the root of the namespace

member.name: M:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.SHGetPathFromIDList(System.IntPtr,System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: The sh get path from id list.

member.name: M:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.PInvokeSHBrowseForFolder(System.Windows.Window)
member.summary: The p invoke sh browse for folder.
member.returns: True if the user selected a folder.

member.name: P:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the Win32::SHBrowseForFolder() BROWSEINFO structure used to create the dialog in ShowDialog().

member.name: P:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowserDialogFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets the ulFlags field of the Win32::SHBrowseForFolder() structure used to create the dialog in ShowDialog().

member.name: P:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.InitialExpandedFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the initially selected and expanded folder path. Overrides SelectedFolder.

member.name: P:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.InitialFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the initially selected folder path.

member.name: P:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.OkButtonText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text for the dialog's OK button.

member.name: P:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.SelectedFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the current and or final selected folder path.

member.name: P:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the string that is displayed above the tree view control in the dialog box (must set BEFORE calling ShowDialog()).

member.name: T:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseCallbackProc
member.returns: The return value of the callback

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_RETURNONLYFSDIRS
member.summary: Only return file system directories. If the user selects folders that are not part of the file system, the OK button is grayed.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_DONTGOBELOWDOMAIN
member.summary: Do not include network folders below the domain level in the dialog box's tree view control.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_STATUSTEXT
member.summary: Include a status area in the dialog box.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_RETURNFSANCESTORS
member.summary: Only return file system ancestors. An ancestor is a subfolder that is beneath the root folder in the namespace hierarchy.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_EDITBOX
member.summary: Include an edit control in the browse dialog box that allows the user to type the name of an item.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_VALIDATE
member.summary: If the user types an invalid name into the edit box, the browse dialog box will call the application's BrowseCallbackProc with the BFFM_VALIDATEFAILED message.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_NEWDIALOGSTYLE
member.summary: Use the new user interface. Setting this flag provides the user with a larger dialog box that can be resized.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_USENEWUI
member.summary: Use the new user interface, including an edit box. This flag is equivalent to BIF_EDITBOX | BIF_NEWDIALOGSTYLE.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_BROWSEINCLUDEURLS
member.summary: The browse dialog box can display URLs. The BIF_USENEWUI and BIF_BROWSEINCLUDEFILES flags must also be set.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_UAHINT
member.summary: Add a UA hint to the dialog, in place of the edit box. May not be combined with BIF_EDITBOX When combined with BIF_NEWDIALOGSTYLE, adds a usage hint to the dialog box in place of the edit box.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_NONEWFOLDERBUTTON
member.summary: Do not include the New Folder button in the browse dialog box.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_NOTRANSLATETARGETS
member.summary: When the selected item is a shortcut, return the PIDL of the shortcut itself rather than its target.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_BROWSEFORCOMPUTER
member.summary: Only return computers. If the user selects anything other than a computer, the OK button is grayed.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_BROWSEFORPRINTER
member.summary: Only allow the selection of printers. If the user selects anything other than a printer, the OK button is grayed.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_BROWSEINCLUDEFILES
member.summary: The browse dialog box will display files as well as folders.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BrowseInfoFlags.BIF_SHAREABLE
member.summary: The browse dialog box can display shareable resources on remote systems.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.MessageFromBrowser.BFFM_INITIALIZED
member.summary: The dialog box has finished initializing.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.MessageFromBrowser.BFFM_SELCHANGED
member.summary: The selection has changed in the dialog box.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.MessageFromBrowser.BFFM_VALIDATEFAILEDA
member.summary: (ANSI) The user typed an invalid name into the dialog's edit box. A nonexistent folder is considered an invalid name.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.MessageFromBrowser.BFFM_VALIDATEFAILEDW
member.summary: (Unicode) The user typed an invalid name into the dialog's edit box. A nonexistent folder is considered an invalid name.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.MessageFromBrowser.BFFM_IUNKNOWN
member.summary: An IUnknown interface is available to the dialog box.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.MessageToBrowser.WM_USER
member.summary: Win32 API macro - start of user defined window message range.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.MessageToBrowser.BFFM_SETSTATUSTEXTA
member.summary: (ANSI) Sets the status text. Set lpData to point to a null-terminated string with the desired text.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.MessageToBrowser.BFFM_ENABLEOK
member.summary: Enables or disables the dialog box's OK button. lParam - To enable, set to a nonzero value. To disable, set to zero.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.MessageToBrowser.BFFM_SETSELECTIONA
member.summary: (ANSI) Specifies the path of a folder to select.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.MessageToBrowser.BFFM_SETSELECTIONW
member.summary: (Unicode) Specifies the path of a folder to select.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.MessageToBrowser.BFFM_SETSTATUSTEXTW
member.summary: (Unicode) Sets the status text. Set lpData to point to a null-terminated string with the desired text.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.MessageToBrowser.BFFM_SETOKTEXT
member.summary: Sets the text that is displayed on the dialog box's OK button.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.MessageToBrowser.BFFM_SETEXPANDED
member.summary: Specifies the path of a folder to expand in the Browse dialog box.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BROWSEINFOW.hwndOwner
member.summary: A handle to the owner window for the dialog box.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BROWSEINFOW.pidlRoot
member.summary: A pointer to an item identifier list (PIDL) specifying the location of the root folder from which to start browsing.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BROWSEINFOW.pszDisplayName
member.summary: The address of a buffer to receive the display name of the folder selected by the user. The size of this buffer is assumed to be MAX_PATH characters.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BROWSEINFOW.lpszTitle
member.summary: The address of a null-terminated string that is displayed above the tree view control in the dialog box.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BROWSEINFOW.ulFlags
member.summary: Flags specifying the options for the dialog box.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BROWSEINFOW.lpfn
member.summary: A BrowseCallbackProc delegate that the dialog box calls when an event occurs.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BROWSEINFOW.lParam
member.summary: An application-defined value that the dialog box passes to the BrowseCallbackProc delegate, if one is specified.

member.name: F:Orc.Toolkit.BrowseForFolderDialog.BROWSEINFOW.iImage
member.summary: A variable to receive the image associated with the selected folder. The image is specified as an index to the system image list.
